sections.title: Typical workflow
sections.intro: Configure Twitter On Demand with the connection fields and run it as part of a BrainBoost pipeline.

cards.title: Connect
cards.text: Provide connection_name in the connection form.

cards.title: Consume
cards.text: Use the emitted items in downstream indexing, search, or automation steps.

items.q: What do I need to configure?
items.a: At minimum: connection_name. Additional fields may be optional depending on your use case.
Returns a model response for each incoming prompt (on-demand).
Outputs are emitted to downstream subscribers in the BrainBoost pipeline. Some datasources also write artifacts (context files, catalogs, or exports) locally based on your configuration.
